translations: and fear Allah and fear Allah
puzzle.hint: This verse emphasizes the spiritual bond among Muslims and the importance of resolving conflicts, connecting it to piety and divine compassion.
puzzle.arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِخْوَةٌۭ فَأَصْلِحُوا۟ بَيْنَ أَخَوَيْكُمْ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
puzzle.verseEn: The believers are but brothers, so make settlement between your brothers. And fear Allāh that you may receive mercy.
